app.name: InnerFriend
app.description: A privacy-first tool for maintaining meaningful friendships based on Dunbar's number research

landing.heroDescription: Based on Dunbar's research, we can only truly maintain about 5 intimate friendships, 15 close friends, and 150 meaningful connections. Inner Friend helps you intentionally nurture the relationships that matter most.

intentionalLimits.title: Intentional Limits
intentionalLimits.description: Science shows we have natural limits to meaningful relationships. Embrace them to focus on who truly matters.

privateByDefault.title: Private by Default
privateByDefault.description: Your lists stay on your device. Create an account only if you want persistence and optional mutual matching.

mutualDiscovery.title: Mutual Discovery
mutualDiscovery.description: Optionally learn when someone you've listed as close has also listed you — a gentle celebration of reciprocity.

mission.title: Face Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site — to share real moments with the people who matter most. When distance separates you, we'll help you spark video calls. But nothing beats being there.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration: Dentyne Ice "Make Face Time"

landing.quote: "Not all relationships are symmetrical — and that's perfectly natural. The goal isn't perfect balance, but intentional presence."

signIn.title: Welcome back
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to access your circles

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

switch.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
switch.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up

toast.signUpSuccess: Account created! You are now signed in.
toast.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email is already registered. Try signing in instead.
toast.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
toast.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

notFound.title: Profile Not Found
notFound.message: No user exists with the handle @{{handle}}

private.title: Private Profile
private.message: @{{handle}} has set their profile to private

tiers.innerDescription: Close friends you see regularly (up to 15)
tiers.outerDescription: Good friends and extended circle (up to 50)
tiers.acquaintedDescription: People you know well enough to greet
tiers.nayborDescription: Trusted neighbors for mutual aid and emergencies
tiers.parasocialDescription: Public figures and content creators you follow

feed.emptyCore: Add some Core friends to see their posts here
feed.emptyInner: Add some Inner friends to see their posts here
feed.emptyOuter: Add some Outer friends to see their posts here

noPostsDescription.core: Your core friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.inner: Your inner circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.outer: Your outer circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!

getStarted.core: Get started by adding up to 5 friends to your Core.
getStarted.inner: Get started by adding up to 15 friends to your Inner Circle.
getStarted.outer: Get started by adding up to 150 friends to your Outer Circle.

addToSee.core: Add up to 5 friends to see their posts here.
addToSee.inner: Add up to 15 friends to see their posts here.
addToSee.outer: Add up to 150 friends to see their posts here.

emptyState.addParasocialsHint: Add creators, celebrities, or figures you follow
emptyState.acquaintedHint: Friends are reclassified here through lack of contact over time
emptyState.roleModelsHint: Add people whose life stories inspire you to be good, better, best
emptyState.nayborsHint: Introduce yourself to your naybors and add them here
emptyState.addToCircleHint: Add someone to your closest circle

feed.outerTab: Outer Plus Feed - Extended circle including naybors

naybor.sosDialogButton: Open Naybor SOS emergency contact dialog
naybor.chooseNaybors: Continue to choose naybors to contact
naybor.locationDescription: When enabled, your approximate location will be shared with your naybors

language.communityTranslation: Join our community of translators to make InnerFriend accessible to more people around the world.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.

footer.tagline: Open source. Built with care for meaningful connections.

connections.requestsDescription: People who want to connect with you

roleModel.addDescription: Add someone whose life story inspires you — living or departed.
roleModel.whyRoleModel: Why is this person a role model?
roleModel.reasonPlaceholder: Describe what you admire about them, what traits you want to embrace, or how their story inspires you to be good, better, best...
roleModel.visibilityNote: This will be visible to your confirmed connections.
roleModel.editReasonDescription: Update why {{name}} is a role model to you.

reserved.deleteConfirmDescription: This will remove {{count}} reserved spot{{note}} from your {{tier}} tier.
reserved.editDescription: Update the number of spots and note for this reserved group.
reserved.notePlaceholder: Only you can see this. E.g., 'People from the hiking group'
reserved.notePlaceholderLong: Only you can see this. E.g., 'People from the hiking group' or 'Family members who prefer privacy'
reserved.addDescription: Reserve spots for people you don't want to explicitly list. Each group counts toward your {{tier}} limit but stays private.

addFriend.circleFullHint: To add someone here, you'll need to move a current {{tier}} friend to another tier first.
addFriend.emailHint: If they also list you as a {{tier}} friend and you both have notifications enabled, you'll both be notified of your mutual connection.
addFriend.phoneHint: Use this for the Tending feature to reach out to friends.
addFriend.nayborPhoneHint: Having contact info for your naybors is essential for emergencies and mutual support.

contactImport.title: Import Contacts
contactImport.description: Import contacts from your phone, vCard file, or CSV spreadsheet. All contacts will be added as Acquainted Cousins.
contactImport.capacityFull: Your Acquainted tier is full. Promote some contacts to make room.
contactImport.importingDescription: Adding contacts to your Acquainted Cousins...
contactImport.privacyNote: Your contact data stays on your device. We never upload or store it.
contactImport.defaultCountryHint: Phone numbers without a country code will use this country. Most contacts are stored without country codes.

promotionInfo.title: Easy Promotion Path
promotionInfo.description: All imported contacts start as Acquainted Cousins. You can easily promote any contact to:

fromPhone.title: Import from Phone
fromPhone.description: Select contacts from your phone's address book

fromVCard.hint: Accepts .vcf or .vcard files from iCloud, Google, Outlook
fromVCard.exportInstructions: Export contacts from your email or phone app as a .vcf file, then import here.

fromCsv.mapColumnsDescription: Select which columns contain your contact information:

columnMapping.name: Full Name Column
columnMapping.orSeparate: Or use separate first/last name columns:

preview.title: Import Preview
preview.capacityWarning: Only {{available}} of {{total}} contacts can be imported. {{skipped}} will be skipped due to capacity limits.
preview.duplicatesInfo: {{count}} contact(s) already exist in your friend list and will be skipped.
preview.promotionReminderDescription: You can easily promote any contact to Core, Inner, Outer, Naybor, or Role Model at any time.

success.title: Import Complete!
success.description: {{count}} contacts added to your Acquainted Cousins.
success.promotionTip: Visit the Manage tab to promote contacts to Core, Inner, Outer, or other tiers.

error.title: Import Failed
error.generic: Unable to import contacts. Please try again.

errors.notSupported: Contact Picker is not supported on this device
errors.invalidVCardFile: Please select a valid vCard file (.vcf or .vcard)
errors.invalidCsvFile: Please select a valid CSV file
errors.noContactsFound: No contacts found in the file
errors.nameColumnRequired: A name column is required to import contacts

contactImport.mobileOnly: Contact Picker is only available on mobile devices. Use vCard or CSV import instead.
contactImport.browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support Contact Picker. Use vCard or CSV import instead.
contactImport.useFileImport: Try importing from a vCard or CSV file instead.
